nodes.text: The Imperial heavy repeater was a type of weapon manufactured by BlasTech Industries and used by the Galactic Empire. At some point during the Empire's reign, Masse Goskey and his associate Ephant Mon, who ran Masse Goskey's Arms Emporium and Explosives Mart in Mos Eisley spaceport on the planet Tatooine, purchased an Imperial heavy repeater for 2,700 credits. Mon recorded the transaction in the Smuggler's Guide, a book that was owned by various criminals, with each adding information to the guide.
